entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
